name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
acetic acid
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
and optionally sulfuric acid
and/or dipicolinic acid (DPA)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722 -84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidine-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), and optionally sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9) and/or dipicolinic acid (DPA) (CAS Reg. No. 499-83-2).
